ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT - Video cards, was:Equipment question
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a 933mhz p3 and 128mb sdram (dial up connection) I also have some Intel video card I ve never heard of (Compaq Presario system) The graphics seem
ygData.messageBody:
I have a 933mhz p3 and 128mb sdram (dial up
connection) I also have some "Intel" video card
I've never heard of (Compaq Presario system) The
graphics seem pretty good, much better than my
last computer anyway (which had a VooDoo3 2000),
but I still have to run in 480 x 640 video mode -
What are the benefits of running the game in a
different video mode? My system runs on 768 x
1024 video mode, but if I try to switch the game
to that mode, the veiwing area becomes very tiny.
If I want to take advantage of my full monitor
screen I have to run in 480 x 640... Why is this?
And does it really matter?

Btw, Bard's finally 13th level, just been too
lazy to switch sig...hehe


=====
Kinrea Keres 44th Teir'dal Warrior
<Chaotic Horde>
Sinarya L'achesis 25th Teir'dal Necromancer
Lereny 12th Half elf Bard
Zyrrah 7th Teir'dal Cleric
Saryrn Server
